#include<stdio.h>
int fact(int n)
{
	if(n == 0)
		return 1;
	else 
		return n * fact(n-1);
}
int ncr(int n, int r)
{
	return fact(n) / (fact(n-r) * fact(r));
}
int main()
{
	int t, i, k, count, c;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int a[100] = {0};
		for(i=0;i<11;i++)
		{
			scanf("%d", &c);
			a[c-1]++;
		}
		scanf("%d", &k);
		count = 1;
		for(i = 99; i>=0 && k>0; i--)
		{
			if(a[i] > 0)
			{
				if(k >= a[i])
				{
					k -= a[i];
				}
				else
				{
					count *= ncr(a[i], k);
					k = 0;
				}
			}
		}
		printf("%d\n", count);
	}
	return 0;
}
